sketch_size.help_text: Value of k. Only k = 21, 31 are currently supported.

sylphtax_db_tag.help_text: Path to taxonomy metadata for sylph (list of sylph-tax identifiers)

sylph_estimate_unknown.help_text: Estimate proportion of sample reads that originate from species not represented in the reference database.

sylph_read_seq_id.help_text: Estimated percentage identity of your sequences (i.e. 100 - error percent). 99.5 is recommended for Illumina reads. Without this option when the -u option is used, sylph provides its own estimate for percentage identity. See Sylph documentation for additional information.

bracken_classification_level.help_text: Taxonomic rank to analyze for Bracken (Options: 'D', 'P', 'C', 'O', 'F', 'G', 'S'). Cannot check the accuracy of classification at species level if bracken classification level is not set to 'S' (species)

read_len.help_text: Expected length of reads in the sample
